title: One Week Later
creator_credit: Peter Snelling, Rachel Tunnard, Mandy Rathbone, Ferndown Upper School, First Light and PVA Medialab
brief_description: Told through the eyes of a younger pupil, who surveys the relationships his brother has with his peer group. As revelations and misunderstandings occur, due to the misuse of the ubiquitous mobile phone, the week’s events come to a climax on a Friday afternoon.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Snelling, Rachel Tunnard, Mandy Rathbone, Ferndown Upper School, First Light and PVA Medialab
